title: Two Low Grade (SGC 10) T206's for Sale (Dahlen - Brookyln and Persons -Southern League)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Two Low Grade (SGC 10) T206's for Sale (Dahlen - Brookyln and Persons -Southern League)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott T
I have two low grade T206's for sale.  The Dahlen is the rarer "Brooklyn" version which I recently bought not realizing that I had previously misfiled a Brooklen version as the Boston version.  D'oh!

[IMG]http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y133/scottopotamus/Trade%20Bait/Graded%20Cards/scan.jpg[/IMG]

Both cards have substantial paper loss on the back and the Dahlen also has some kind of mark on it.

These cards are the reasons they invented the "poor" grade.

Dahlen $125.00

Persons  $30.00

Scott

posts.post_title: Two Low Grade (SGC 10) T206's for Sale (Dahlen - Brookyln and Persons -Southern League)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim VB
Scott, 

I also, just tried to send you an email. Got this reply:

<<I apologize for this automatic reply to your email.
To control spam, I now allow incoming messages only from senders I have approved beforehand. 
If you would like to be added to my list of approved senders, please fill out the short request form (see link below). Once I approve you, I will receive your original message in my inbox. You do not need to resend your message. I apologize for this one-time inconvenience. 
Click the link below to fill out the request:>>


I think selling on the B/S/T would be easier if your spam filter settings weren't so high that anyone emailing you had to fill out a request form. Just a thought. 



Jim VB
